title: Patriots' Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft have to wait on the Hall of Fame. Tom Brady won't. Here's why

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Patriots' Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft have to wait on the Hall of Fame. Tom Brady won't. Here's why
sources.description: A different voting process works favorably for Brady. Sure, Deflategate is always going to be a debated part of Bradyâ€™s history. But it also became a speck of sand in the middle of his career.
